description: Describes the most recent volume modification request for the specified EBS volumes. For more information, see Monitor the progress of volume modifications in the Amazon EBS User Guide.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. modification-state - The current modification state (modifying | optimizing | completed | failed). original-iops - The original IOPS rate of the volume. original-size - The original size of the volume, in GiB. original-volume-type - The original volume type of the volume (standard | io1 | io2 | gp2 | sc1 | st1). originalMultiAttachEnabled - Indicates whether Multi-Attach support was enabled (true | false). start-time - The modification start time. target-iops - The target IOPS rate of the volume. target-size - The target size of the volume, in GiB. target-volume-type - The target volume type of the volume (standard | io1 | io2 | gp2 | sc1 | st1). targetMultiAttachEnabled - Indicates whether Multi-Attach support is to be enabled (true | false). volume-id - The ID of the volume. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to include in another request to get the next page of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message about the modification progress or failure.

nested_items.name: TargetSize
nested_items.description: The target size of the volume, in GiB.

nested_items.name: TargetIops
nested_items.description: The target IOPS rate of the volume.

nested_items.name: TargetVolumeType
nested_items.description: The target EBS volume type of the volume.

nested_items.name: TargetThroughput
nested_items.description: The target throughput of the volume, in MiB/s.

nested_items.name: TargetMultiAttachEnabled
nested_items.description: The target setting for Amazon EBS Multi-Attach.

nested_items.name: OriginalSize
nested_items.description: The original size of the volume, in GiB.

nested_items.name: OriginalIops
nested_items.description: The original IOPS rate of the volume.

nested_items.name: OriginalVolumeType
nested_items.description: The original EBS volume type of the volume.

nested_items.name: OriginalThroughput
nested_items.description: The original throughput of the volume, in MiB/s.

nested_items.name: OriginalMultiAttachEnabled
nested_items.description: The original setting for Amazon EBS Multi-Attach.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The modification progress, from 0 to 100 percent complete.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The modification completion or failure time.
